description: Gets the object definitions for a set of objects associated with the pipeline. Object definitions are composed of a set of fields that define the properties of the object.

parameters.name: pipelineId
parameters.description: The ID of the pipeline that contains the object definitions.

parameters.name: objectIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the pipeline objects that contain the definitions to be described. You can pass as many as 25 identifiers in a single call to DescribeObjects. (string) ---

nested_items.name: fields
nested_items.description: Key-value pairs that define the properties of the object.

nested_items.name: stringValue
nested_items.description: The field value, expressed as a String.

nested_items.name: refValue
nested_items.description: The field value, expressed as the identifier of another object.

nested_items.name: marker
nested_items.description: The starting point for the next page of results. To view the next page of results, call DescribeObjects again with this marker value. If the value is null, there are no more results.

nested_items.name: hasMoreResults
nested_items.description: Indicates whether there are more results to return.
